description: Analyzes the user's existing privacy policy via Knowledge Base to understand legal tone, structural format, clause patterns, and terminology. Generates new privacy policy drafts that match the company's established voice, legal precision, and section organization based on user-described scenarios (new regions, features, regulations).

example_response.policy_title: Title of the generated privacy policy or section
example_response.policy_content: The full generated privacy policy draft text with proper legal formatting
example_response.regulation_framework: The regulation framework targeted (GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, PIPEDA, General, or Custom)
example_response.scope_type: The scope of generation: Full Policy, Specific Section, or Amendment Clause
example_response.compliance_notes: Notes on compliance considerations, regulatory requirements met, and any caveats
example_response.revision_suggestions: Suggestions for areas that may need further review or customization
